trs: Rashid told everyone that he had seen Pak Samad's wife flirting with Mr.  Romi while she was buying household items at the market.

label: Semasa Hawa di-panggil untuk mem-buat kenyataan di balai polis, Hawa kelihatan teruk di-cederakan oleh [suami-nya] sehingga mata, kepala dan leher-nya perlu di-balut.
trs: While Hawa was called in to make a statement at the police station, she seemed badly hurt by her husband, to the point where her eyes, head, and neck had to be bandaged.
